Package com.github.aklakina.edmma.humanInterface

Class main_window

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.aklakina.edmma.humanInterface.main_window
  • public class main_window
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the main window of the application. It contains methods for constructing the tree and table views, displaying statistics, and copying data to the clipboard. It also contains a main method to start the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      main_window()
      The constructor sets the cell renderer for the tree view.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void constructTable​(Cluster cluster)
      This method constructs the table view for the given cluster.
      void constructTree​(Cluster cluster)
      This method constructs the tree view for the given cluster.
      void displayStatistics​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> stats)
      This method displays the statistics by setting the text of the corresponding labels.
      int getTheorKills()
      This method returns the value of the slider which represents the theoretical kills.
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method starts the application.
      void resetSlider()
      This method resets the slider by setting its value and minimum to 0.
      void setCluster​(java.lang.String clusterName)
      This method sets the cluster name in the main window.
      void start()
      This method starts the main window.

    • Constructor Detail

      • main_window

        public main_window()
        The constructor sets the cell renderer for the tree view.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method starts the application. It checks if the directory containing the Elite Dangerous log files exists, starts the Init singleton, creates a JFrame, sets the content pane to the main window's panel, and makes the frame visible.
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments.

      • setCluster

        public void setCluster​(java.lang.String clusterName)
        This method sets the cluster name in the main window.
        Parameters:
        clusterName - The name of the cluster.

      • start

        public void start()
        This method starts the main window. It adds change listeners to the slider and action listeners to the copy buttons.

      • getTheorKills

        public int getTheorKills()
        This method returns the value of the slider which represents the theoretical kills.
        Returns:
        The value of the slider.

      • resetSlider

        public void resetSlider()
        This method resets the slider by setting its value and minimum to 0.

      • displayStatistics

        public void displayStatistics​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> stats)
        This method displays the statistics by setting the text of the corresponding labels.
        Parameters:
        stats - A map containing the statistics. The key is the name of the statistic and the value is the value of the statistic.

      • constructTree

        public void constructTree​(Cluster cluster)
        This method constructs the tree view for the given cluster.
        Parameters:
        cluster - The cluster for which the tree view is to be constructed.

      • constructTable

        public void constructTable​(Cluster cluster)
        This method constructs the table view for the given cluster.
        Parameters:
        cluster - The cluster for which the table view is to be constructed.
